entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
